column1: :The main article for this subject is located at Morgul Vale.

column2: meaning "(Deep/Narrow) Valley of Black Sorcery" (from imlad + morgul) in Sindarin
column3: was the valley among the western slopes of the Ephel Dúath where Minas Morgul (originally Minas Ithil) stood. This name was used in the later Third Age after the capture of the tower by the Nazgûl.
